oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reunion ribbon from the 1889 Blue-Gray Barbeque
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reunion ribbon from the Blue-Gray Barbeque at Crawfish Springs, Georgia (Chickamauga) on Sept. 20, 1889, prior to the establishment of America's first Civil War national battlefield at this place two years later. The barbeque was attended by former Confederate and Federal veterans who fought at Chickamauga September 18-20, 1863.
